name: LIV+
0:
”Alexa turn LIV on”
”Alexa run patio mosquito protection”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
LIV is the smart mosquito repellent solution that lets you use your backyard without the presence of pesky mosquitoes. A smart system, the LIV+ app gives you the ability to use powerful features for your LIV mosquito repellent system to unlock your outdoor spaces. Use the LIV+ skill to manage your system. Simply enable the LIV+ skill in the Alexa app and link your Alexa and LIV+ accounts to get started. 
 
With an installed LIV system connected to your home Wi-Fi network, you can manage your smart hub and repellers. Simply say: 
“Alexa, turn LIV on.”
“Alexa, run Patio Mosquito Protection*”
